resources.string:
This is Wallpapers for Android Auto (WP4AA), a theme to change Android Auto background 

If you want to thank me for the development and the effort, you could make a donation via PayPal with the button down below. 
Even a small amount would be much appreciated ðŸ˜Š
Many thanks for the wallpapers go to: %1$s

_R1zz_ - Google Pixel Wallpapers
Atlas-83 - GoT Wallpapers
APAstrolab, John Sim - Astrophotography wallpapers

To install a background wallpaper:
 1. Tick Android Auto and select a wallpaper from list
 2. Hit the bottom button and select Build & Install
 3. Reboot, go to manager tab, select the built overlay(s) and enable

To install a background wallpaper:
 1. Tick Android Auto and select a wallpaper from list
 2. Hit the bottom button and select Build & Install
 3. Reboot, go to manager tab, select the built overlay(s) and enable

Heya!
 If you are here, that's because you don't have Substratum Installed.
 Wallpapers For AA is a theme and needs Substratum to work, it's not a stand-alone app.
 Please install Substratum and try again.
Hey, would you take a moment to rate this theme on XDA Labs?
You seem to really enjoy Substratum Wallpapers For AA, would you like to show appreciation with a donation?
Check out the other variants of WP4AA
